name: Truth Or Dare (Ad Free)
description:
The full version of 'Truth or Dare' offers the best gaming experience - ad free.

Let's Play TRUTH or DARE !!!

Looking for the best party game of your life?
--- You might just found it ---
Truth or Dare is a game featuring
tons of challenges, and bravery tests!

• Play the most original truths and dares!
• Enjoy SECRET PRIVILEGES, only the app owner can have!
• Add your own questions and challenges - make it personal, or dirty as you like!
• We have 5 challenging categories to choose from!
• Play clean as it can be...
• Or play it HARD and find out how brave you really are!
• Record new tasks with your own voice, OR let our advanced Text-to-Speech engine read the tasks for you!
• Customize the game with cool backgrounds, and bottles!
• Keep a sweet memory by recording the tasks, and share them with friends!
• Browse our gallery, and like or comment on other people videos and photos!

With Truth or Dare you can:
- Have an unforgettable party with your friends!
- Play in a slumber party, birthday or any other social meeting!
- Spin the bottle, or shake the device to get a task!
- Play for hours without getting bored! never get the same task!
- Get popular and break the ice with instant laughs, and fun moments!
- Play on your iPhone or iPad, in a group, or just couples!
- Be the star of party! have fun at Valentine's Day, Christmas, or New Year's Eve!

• We have spent over 3 years of R&D
to give you the BEST PARTY GAME imaginable!

But hey, don't take it from us!

• appPicker.com

Truth or Dare gives you and your friends an entertaining game to pass time with.
This game is all about being daring. It's a multiplayer game with more than 300 graphic tasks are nothing short of extreme. You're going to need to be very brave to complete any of these tasks. This game is a whole lot of fun with a group of friends who are ready to share a life and a great time. Just be prepared that this game is very addictive so there’s a good chance this will become the new favorite game with friends.
What I liked about this app was the fact there was everything from relatively mild/tame tasks right up to the uncomfortable ones meant for the strongest in the bunch.
